snippet: Richard Haste, a New York police officer, is expected to surrender on Wednesday on charges of first- and second-degree manslaughter in the shooting of 18-year-old Ramarley Graham.
abstract: Richard Haste, a New York police officer, is expected to surrender on charges of first- and second-degree manslaughter in the shooting of 18-year-old Ramarley Graham.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and WENDY RUDERMAN
byline.contributor: Russ Buettner and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Richard Haste, a New York police officer, is expected to surrender on Wednesday on charges of first- and second-degree manslaughter in the shooting of 18-year-old Ramarley Graham.

headline.seo: Officer to Face Manslaughter Charges in Bronx Shooting
headline.main: Officer Faces Manslaughter Charges in a Bronx Death
headline.print_headline: Officer Faces Manslaughter Charges in a Bronx Death
